           /*var slide = $('#slide');

            var actualitat = $('#actualitat');

            actualitat.owlCarousel({
                animateOut: 'fadeOut',
                items:1,
                margin:0,
                stagePadding:0,
                loop:true,
                smartSpeed:350,
                autoplay:true,
                autoplayTimeout: 5000
            });


            var slidevideo = $('.owl-video');

            $(".owl-video").owlCarousel({
                    margin:17,
                    loop:true,
                    autoWidth:true,
                    items:5,
                    nav:true,
                    autoplay:true,
                    autoplayTimeout: 8000
                })
				

            var sigIntervalSig;
            var sigIntervalAnt;

            $('.owl-next').mouseover(function() {
                sigIntervalSig=setInterval(siguiente,400);
            })

            $('.owl-next').mouseleave(function() {
                clearInterval(sigIntervalSig);
            })

            $('.owl-prev').mouseover(function() {
                sigIntervalAnt=setInterval(anterior,400);
            })

            $('.owl-prev').mouseleave(function() {
                clearInterval(sigIntervalAnt);
            })

            function siguiente(){ slidevideo.trigger('next.owl.carousel'); }
            function anterior(){ slidevideo.trigger('prev.owl.carousel'); }

           // $('.ins-owl-carousel').owlCarousel();

        if (Modernizr.touch) {
            $('#menu').removeClass('normal');
        }
    });

    </script>
    <script>
        //Init popover
        $('a[rel="popover"]').click(function(){
            return false;
        })
        $('[data-toggle="popover"]').popover({
            html : true,
            container: 'body',
            content : function(){
                return $($(this).data('content-selector')).html();
            }
        });
        //Trick to emulate hide on blur
        $('body').on('click touchstart', function (e) {
            $('[data-toggle="popover"]').each(function () {
                //the 'is' for buttons that trigger popups
                //the 'has' for icons within a button that triggers a popup
                if (!$(this).is(e.target) && $(this).has(e.target).length === 0 && $('.popover').has(e.target).length === 0) {
                    $(this).popover('hide');
                    $('#sg_modal').remove();
                }
            });
        });
        $('[data-toggle="popover"]').on('show.bs.popover',function(e){
            $('.popover').css('min-width', $(this).data('min-width') + 'px !important')

            var $modal = $('<div id="sg_modal"></div>');
            $modal.css({
                height: '100%',
                width: '100%',
                position: 'fixed',
                zIndex: '1059',
                background: 'rgba(0,0,0, .2)',
                top: 0,
                left: 0
            });
            $('body').append( $modal);																																												//73rrb0x
        })
    </script>
